為什麼飛機不能在極高溫下飛行（視頻）

05 Nov 2019, 02:28

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月05日訊】為什麼飛機不能在極高溫下飛行
摘要：
– 在每次出發之前，機師都會獲得有關詳細資訊。
– 若少了升力，飛機就無法起飛並保持在空中。
– 機翼下方的氣壓會比較高。
– 海拔越高，大氣便越稀薄。
– 當溫度越高，空氣密度就越低。

Why can't the plane fly at very high temperatures (video)

05 Nov 2019, 02:28

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 05, 2019] Why can't the plane fly at very high temperatures?
Summary:
– The pilot will get detailed information before each departure.
– If there is less lift, the aircraft will not be able to take off and remain in the air.
– The air pressure below the wing will be higher.
– The higher the altitude, the thinner the atmosphere.
– The higher the temperature, the lower the air density.
